mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (userid, password, email, name) VALUES (#{userid}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name});
mapper.select: SELECT u.userid, u.name, u.email, u.del_flg, u.role, r.role_name FROM user u LEFT JOIN role r ON u.role = r.role_id;
SELECT u.userid, u.name, u.password, u.email, u.photo_url, u.role, r.role_name FROM user u LEFT JOIN role r ON u.role = r.role_id WHERE userid = #{userid} AND NOT del_flg = TRUE;
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET del_flg = TRUE WHERE userid = #{userid};
